meanings.upright: The Fool upright: New beginnings, spontaneity, and faith. Lean into this energy today; stay present and intentional.

love.upright: In love, the fool favors New beginnings and spontaneity. Share feelings clearly and set kind boundaries.
love.reversed: In love (reversed), watch for Recklessness and hesitation. Slow down, clarify needs, and avoid assumptions.

career.upright: Work & career: New beginnings, spontaneity, and faith. Prioritize one task, keep scope clear, and act decisively.
career.reversed: Work (reversed): Recklessness and hesitation may appear. Re-align goals, cut noise, and ask for help if needed.

wellbeing.upright: Wellbeing: New beginnings and spontaneity. Choose simple routines—sleep, movement, nourishing food.
wellbeing.reversed: Wellbeing (reversed): Recklessness and hesitation. Rest, breathe, and simplify your schedule.
